players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Let's discuss who might have targeted Diana and why. Any thoughts on suspicious behavior?"
Charlie: "I agree with Alice, let's discuss possible suspects. I find Bob's behavior strange last night as he seemed unusually quiet and withdrawn."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it."
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, why didn't you reveal your investigation result earlier? Your silence until now makes me suspicious of your claim."
Bob: "Charlie is clearly trying to deflect suspicion onto me since he knows I discovered his role. I wanted to be sure of my findings before making an accusation."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
